title: Dweller
description: Compels an entity to join and migrate between villages and other dwellings.

fields.title: Dwelling Type
fields.description: The type of dwelling the entity wishes to join. Current Types: village.

fields.title: Dwelling Role
fields.description: The role of which the entity plays in the dwelling. Current Roles: inhabitant, defender, hostile, passive.

fields.title: Update Interval Base
fields.description: How often the entity checks on their dwelling status in ticks. Positive values only.

fields.title: Update Interval Variant
fields.description: The variant value in ticks that will be added to the update_interval_base.

fields.title: Can find POI
fields.description: Whether or not the entity can find and add POIs to the dwelling.

fields.title: First Founding Reward
fields.description: Determines how much reputation players are rewarded on first founding.

fields.title: Can Migrate
fields.description: Determines whether the entity can migrate between dwellings, or only have its initial dwelling.

fields.title: Dwelling Bounds Tolerance
fields.description: A padding distance for checking if the entity is within the dwelling.

fields.title: Preferred Profession
fields.description: Allows the user to define a starting profession for this particular Dweller, instead of letting them choose organically. (They still need to gain experience from trading before this takes effect.)
